attributionColor.comment: The text color for the source attribution line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
blockEdgeColor.comment: The color to use for the outline of block shapes expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
blockFaceColor.comment: The color to use for the unfilled portion of the block face expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
blockSatRangeColors.comment: Definitions of sat ranges to colors used for mempool blocks and text

blockSatRangeColors._config_summary.comment: A brief description of this item for nodeyez-config app
blockSatRangeColors.satMin.comment: The minimum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
blockSatRangeColors.satMax.comment: The maximum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
blockSatRangeColors.blockColor.comment: The color to use for the face of the block when the sat/vbyte is within range of satMin-satMax
blockSatRangeColors.textColor.comment: The color to use for the text of the block when the sat/vbyte is within range of satMin-satMax

blockSideColor.comment: The color to use for the side of the block expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
blockTopColor.comment: The color to use for the top of the block expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
feeHistogramUrl.comment: The url for the mempool fee histogram data. If you are running your own mempool.space service on MyNodeBTC, then use http://127.0.0.1:4080/api/mempool
feeRecommendationsUrl.comment: The url for the mempool fees recommendation. If you are running your own mempool.space service on MyNodeBTC, then use http://127.0.0.1:4080/api/v1/fees/recommended
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
histogramSatRangeColors.comment: Definitions of sat ranges to colors used for histogram chart

histogramSatRangeColors._config_summary.comment: A brief description of this item for nodeyez-config app
histogramSatRangeColors.satMin.comment: The minimum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
histogramSatRangeColors.satMax.comment: The maximum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
histogramSatRangeColors.fillColor.comment: The color to use for the graph portion when the sat/vbyte is within range of satMin-satMax

interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
mempoolBlocksUrl.comment: The url for the mempool blocks information. If you are running your own mempool.space service on MyNodeBTC, then use http://127.0.0.1:4080/api/v1/fees/mempool-blocks
renderDirection.comment: The direction to render the image.

renderDirection.choices.righttoleft: Next block starts from the right side of the image (default)
renderDirection.choices.lefttoright: Next block starts from the left side of the image

renderMaximumBlocks.comment: The maximum number (1-6) of upcoming blocks to render which will influence the size of the blocks drawn
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
